Through the [[Deva Path]], [[Nagato]] imprisons his opponent with [[Chibaku Tensei]]. Once the sphere is complete, [[Konan]] embraces it with her paper wings, covering it in billions of [[explosive tag]]s. She then sends a single origami bird that sets off the explosions.
